It's old and feels that way.  Everyone who still plays it has been doing so for a decade and will ruin any fun you might otherwise have while trying to figure the game out.

Beware!!! The VAC anticheat system(on most fun servers) on Counter-strike Source will ban your account permanently without warning of any along with 
Day of Defeat: Source 
Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
Half-Life Deathmatch: Source
Team Fortress 2

that u never played even in your lifetime!!! crazy! You cannot rebuy the game on the account. And they claimed that the support team does not undo the ban. I only played and made mistakes in some minimal competitive servers like bunny hop jump with no competitive unfairness of other players. I use tools only for research, study and conveniency for me relating fun on the game with no interfere with the fairness of other players at all. And they banned CSS along with other never-played games!!!

Buyer, beware of easy to lose the CSS and source engine game of the account after paid.
A simple, yet fully functional modern military shooter. Though it definitely shows its age, Counter-Strike: Source is one of the more interesting titles of its time.

[b]Classic.[/b] It's a must have even if the community is not as large as CS:GO's. The price dropped down from $20 to $10. I recommend to buy this game on sale.

Way better than CS:GO. Better gun sounds and physics , better community , the gameplay mechanics haven't changed , it's cheaper and it doesen't have skins which you have to pay to get (or be lucky enough to get one for free). Also , the graphics aren't that much weaker.

Плюсы этой игры
____________
+Много режимов, например: (jail, bhop, deathrun, и т.д)
+Графика (ну это же  SOURCE этот движок могёт)
+Потянет на слабом пк (у меня ноут слабый, но несмотря на это, потянула у меня на ультрах.
+Оружие из реальной жизни (всеми любимый ак-47, или мп5,)
+Затягивает (если играть с другом, то это затянется на долго, если у вас есть друзья :) )
____________
За эти 13.7 часов пока что минусов не обнаружил, и надеюсь их и не будет.

CS:GO'nun düşük sistemli ve "normal kitlesi" olan,hileye az rastlanan bir hali. Eğer canınız sıkıldıysa sıkıntınıza çare olabilecek bir oyun. Ama fiyatı biraz uçuk,o yüzden indirimi beklemenizi tavsiye ederim. Gönül rahatlığıyla alabilirsiniz.

CS:GO's lower system,have "normal audience" situation, and rarely you can see cheats. If you were bored, this game is maintenance your distress. But this game is a bit expensive, so I advice you can wait the sale. You can take it with ease.

Valve has done a sterling job of moving a flagship franchise over to a new engine. Whilst the gameplay guts come over correct and intact, (which may disappoint some), Counter-Strike: Source is an even more engrossing and captivating experience, capable of sapping hours of your time, and even the worst "1337 g33zers" abusing voice chat can't spoil the fun you'll have with it. (review from 4/5/2005)

На мой взгляд - она намного лучше чем КС:ГО. Но в последнее время "чистый" сервер - без всяких модов/скинов/озвучек и тд найти очень сложно. Стало мало серверов стим версии. Но все же если поискать, то найти можно. На чистых серваках стим версии играть приятно и можно.
